alert.note: Alert for Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 11:56AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch, especially towards the Quebec border, for a storm total snowfall of 6 to 12 inches. Sleet accumulations around one quarter of an inch and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Piscataquis and Northern Somerset Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...The strong winds and weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet, and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
